newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian regional newspaper group reorganises.
newsitem.headline: Belgian regional newspaper group reorganises.

text.p: Belgium's Vers l'Avenir newspaper group said on Thursday it had regrouped its titles within a new company, Editions de l'Avenir SA.

The new group would comprise the daily titles L'Avenir du Luxembourg, Le Courrier de l'Escaut, Le Rappel, Le Jour-Le Courrier and flagship Vers l'Avenir and the weekly title Le Courrier de Philippeville.
The group's total readership is around 608,000, it said in a statement.
